creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: dark maroon shawl with appliqué; top and bottom edges finished with two rows of added fabric with stitched and woven motifs; geometric designs; motifs include triangles, squares and circles; nine large areas of appliqué in center contain mirrors; five appliquéd triangles in solid fabric along top and bottom edges; side edges raw
title: Shawl
